sentence: In Washington state, Trump endorsed the candidacy of former gubernatorial candidate Loren Culp, a Republican who is running against GOP Rep. Dan Newhouse in the state's 4th District.
author: Chris Cillizza
title: Two more Republicans just went on Donald Trump's hit list

sentence: Trump endorsed 2020 GOP gubernatorial nominee Loren Culp, who refused to concede that race despite losing by 13.5 points to Democratic Gov.
title: New lines, interesting races in Washington state

sentence: * Versus U.S. Representative Dan Newhouse * Aug. 2 Republican primary for Washington's 4th congressional district Trump's pick to challenge Newhouse is former small-town police chief Loren Culp, who in March called for the execution of a Black man accused of badly injuring a woman by throwing her down the stairs of a train station.
author: Reuters
title: Factbox: Trump's endorsement power faces test in key elections
